body_html:
Indeed, our current answer is: only install the GPU wheel on a machine that has the GPU libraries installed, otherwise install the CPU wheel.

However, it might be nice sometimes for people to be able to install one wheel that worked everywhere (even if it was more bloated) -- this issue is just tracking that feature request. It's not something we're highly likely to work on any time soon given the hundreds of other issues we currently have, but if someone from the community is interested in digging in to figure it out, it would be appreciated :).
